sentences.sContent: This is an example of defensive programming.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is an example of defensive programming.
sentences.sCn: 这是一个防御编程的实例。

sentences.sContent: Accessors for immutable properties will always have value semantics and do not need the defensive copying on either side of the call, making them more efficient.
sentences.sContent_eng: Accessors for immutable properties will always have value semantics and do not need the defensive copying on either side of the call, making them more efficient.
sentences.sCn: 不可变属性的存取器将总是具有值引用，因而调用的任何一方都不需要防御性复制，这使得它们效率更高。

sentences.sContent: Wailing “You never listen to me” will only make them defensive.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wailing “You never listen to me” will only make them defensive.
sentences.sCn: “你从来不听我说”，这种抱怨只会激起他们自我防御。

words.tran: 卫冕的；防御中的；防守型的
可防御的；可辩护的；可拥护的

防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备
